citation_mappings.claim_text: Here’s a concise overview of live interpreter translation services and rough 2-day cost estimates (pricing varies by language, event type, and provider; detailed quotes typically required): 1) **LanguageLine Solutions 2.9•Translation service•Open Type: On-demand phone/video interpreters (24/7, 240+ languages) with live human interpreters. LanguageLine Solutions+1
